sourcesContent:
Примеры object из курса JS:

{{ person.name }}
{{ person.lastname }}
{{ person.age }}
{{ person.isProgrammer }}
{{ person.languages }}
{{ person['complex key'] }}
{{ person['key_4'] }}
{{ person.greet() }}

{{ person[ageKey] }}

{{person[key]}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core' @Component({ selector: 'app-object', templateUrl: './object.component.html', styleUrls: ['./object.component.css'], }) export class ObjectComponent { person: any = { name: 'Владимир', lastname: 'Ленин', age: 65, isProgrammer: true, languages: ['ru', 'en', 'de'], 'complex key': 'Complex Value', ['key_' + (1 + 3)]: 'Computed Key', greet() { console.log('greet from person') }, } ageKey = 'age' newAge = this.person[this.ageKey]++ newLanguages = this.person.languages.push('by') // newKey_4 = delete this.person['key_4']; keys = Object.keys(this.person) }
